description: This is a Java class representing a data transfer object (DTO) for utility payments within the financial application. It extends AuditAware and includes fields such as providerId, amount, referenceNumber, account, and status.

classes.name: UtilityPayment
classes.description: A DTO class representing utility payment details, extending AuditAware to include audit functionality.

methods.name: UtilityPayment (constructor)
methods.description: Default constructor provided implicitly by Lombok @Data annotation.
